What we love

If you’ve tried MagSafe wallets and they aren’t for you, a traditional bifold design like this with Apple Find My integration could be a better fit. I dig the clean, straight-forward design and Miroddi claims that it can hold “7+ cards, 35 bills, and 10 coins.”

items.title: This Anker 100W 3-port GaN Prime charger is half the size of Apple’s, now down to one of its lowest prices at $45
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Anker’s official storefront offering its 100W 3-port Prime charger for $45.49 shipped. Originally priced at $85, this USB-C charger has more recently hovered around $70 on Amazon. Today’s deal drops it by $25, bringing it within just $3.50 of the lowest price we’ve seen there. It briefly hit $35 at Best Buy during last year’s Prime Day, which only a few were able to grab before it sold out. It’s now fetching one of the best prices we’ve tracked, making this a great time to cash in if you’ve been wanting to replace a bulky old charger with something compact.

more…
